Judul: ANALYSIS OF CREDIT RISK MEASUREMENT OF HOUSING LOAN USING INTERNAL MODEL CREDIT RISK+ IN BANK X
Abstrak: The purpose of this research is to find out a method that is going to be used to calculate how high the risk of Housing Loan by using the method of internal model CreditRisk+. Aside from that, Bank X can also measure the expected loss and the unexpected loss, as well as the amount of economic capital that has to be provided by Bank X to cover the unexpected loss.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Ir. Achmad Herlanto Anggono, MBA.
Kata Kunci: exposure at default, expected loss, unexpected loss, economic capital
